name: Brian Gitonga
bio: With over 5 years of experience in the industry, I am adept at identifying new business opportunities, cultivating relationships, and closing deals to achieve revenue objectives. Throughout his career, Brian has worn many hats such as Business Development Manager, Estimator & Project Manager where he consistently exceeded targets and delivered exceptional results by leveraging my strong business acumen, analytical skills, and persuasive communication abilities. His expertise lies in developing and executing comprehensive business development strategies that align with organizational goals, while effectively managing key client relationships and fostering long-term partnerships.

name: Victor Githui
bio: Experienced Software Engineer specializing in UI/UX Design and Web development, recognized for problem-solving and customer satisfaction. Highly organized, trustworthy, and adept at managing multiple priorities. Proficient across diverse industries such as Point of Sale, Agriculture, Mobility, E-commerce, Motorsports, Human Resources, Entertainment, and more. Additionally he is a self-taught and passionate filmmaker, photographer, and technical trainer with expertise in producing, directing, editing, cinematography, and photography. Adaptable and committed to delivering exceptional results.
